doc.title: Te tahi atu, te iritiraa e te tauiraa i te mau ture

newBtn.title: Hou:
newBtn.explain: A hamani i te hoê papa'iraa apî no te ture

saveBtn.title: fa'aho'o:
saveBtn.explain: Haapa'o i te mau faanahoraa ture o teie nei

delBtn.title: fa'a'ore:
delBtn.explain: A tumâ i te mau faanahoraa o te ture o teie nei

autoSave.title: Haapa'o auto:
autoSave.explain: E faaherehere - noa - hia te mau taviri ture i tauihia i te mau tauiraa atoa

menu.main: Te tahi atu, te iritiraa e te tauiraa i te mau ture
